tool_description: Analyzes market trends, price movements, and forecasting based on historical sales data and market indicators.

market_data.description: JSON string containing historical market data

analysis_period_months.description: Number of months to analyze for trends

error_messages: Invalid market data: Market data must be a valid JSON string with required time series fields.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data for meaningful trend analysis.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_months must be between 6 and 120.
Unsupported indicators: Use valid indicators from [price, volume, days_on_market, inventory, absorption_rate].
usage: Provide market_data as JSON string from Market Data Collector. Optionally set analysis_period_months and trend_indicators array. Returns comprehensive trend analysis and market insights.

trend_direction.description: Overall market trend direction (increasing, decreasing, stable)

price_change_percent.description: Percentage change in median price over analysis period

market_velocity.description: Market velocity classification (hot, warm, cool, cold)

seasonal_patterns.description: Identified seasonal patterns in the market
